# 2026 Democratic Candidates

Welcome to the South Carolina Democratic Party's candidate page for the 2026 election cycle.

## State Senate Races

### Competitive Districts

**Marcus Thompson** - Running for Senate District 18
Marcus is a community organizer from Columbia with a focus on education reform.

**Lakisha Washington** - Senate District 35 (challenging)
Lakisha is a healthcare advocate from Sumter.

## State House Races

### Open Seats

**Jennifer Martinez** - House District 117
Jennifer is a small business owner from Charleston focused on economic development.

**David Chen** - HD 42 (open seat)
David is a former teacher and education policy expert.

### Challenger Races

**Robert Williams Jr.** - House District 85
Robert is challenging the incumbent Republican in this rural district.

**Sarah Johnson** - District 99 House
Sarah is a nurse practitioner running on healthcare access.

## How to Support Our Candidates

Visit [donate.scdp.org](https://donate.scdp.org) to contribute.

Contact your local county party to volunteer.
